interestingcomments.content: Camera Remote App No 1080 Video /!/ Has anyone had issues with recording in 1080 at any frame rate using the fuji app? Whenever I would set my XT2 to record in 1080 and use the app, the camera would immediately switch to 720. All other setting would be the same. Is this a limitation of the app?
